quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: Maoyan Entertainment is a Technology + Pan-Entertainment service provider. The Company is principally engaged in the provision of online entertainment ticketing services, entertainment content services, advertising services and others. Online entertainment ticketing services mainly include online movie ticketing and entertainment event ticketing service. Entertainment content services mainly provide entertainment content services, including distribution, promotion to production, for various entertainment formats including movies, entertainment events, television series, web series, web movies and variety shows. Advertising services and others business provides advertising services to advertisers as well as advertising agencies in both the movie industry and other industries, and offers online ordering of in-cinema food and beverage, sale of intellectual property (IP) centric movie merchandise and movie ticket membership subscriptions for the cinemas.
